title: Smart Data models Vessel schema
description: The data model is intended to provide information about vessels. It allows to represent the properties of each vessel: static and dynamic information

id.description: Property. Unique identifier of the entity

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Vessel

location.description: Geoproperty. Geojson reference to the item. It can be Point, LineString, Polygon, MultiPoint, MultiLineString or MultiPolygoProperty.

imo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. International Maritime Organization Number (a global forever UID)

mmsi.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Marine Mobile Service Identity Number (a temporarily assigned UID, issued by that object's current flag state)

callSign.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Maritime call signs are call signs assigned as unique identifiers to vessels

speedOverGround.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'meters per second'. Speed Over Ground (SOG).

courseOverGround.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'degree'. Course Over Ground (COG).

heading.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'degree'. Heading of the Vessel (HDG).

rateOfTurn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'degree'. Rate of Turn (ROT).

createdAt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Date and time of creation of the entity represented by an ISO 8601 UTC format.

modifiedAt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Date and time of last modification of the entity represented by an ISO 8601 UTC format.

observedAt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Date and time of this observation represented by an ISO 8601 UTC format.

vesselType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Code for vessel type

vesselSubType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Code for vessel Sub-Type

grossTonnage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'moorson tons'. Gross Tonnage (GT).

beam.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'meters'. Beam of Vessel.

length.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'meters'. Length of Vessel.

buildingAt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Date and time of building of the vessel represented by an ISO 8601 UTC format.

toBow.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'meters'. Dimension to Bow.

toStern.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'meters'. Dimension to Stern.

toPort.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'meters'. Dimension to Port.

toStardboard.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'meters'. Dimension to Starboard.

navigationStatus.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Enum: '0=Under way using engine,1=At anchor,2=Not under command,3=Restricted manoeuverability,4=Constrained by her draught,5=Moored,6=Aground,7=Engaged in Fishing,8=Under way sailing,9=Reserved for future amendment of Navigational Status for HSC,10=Reserved for future amendment of Navigational Status for WIG,11=Reserved for future use,12=Reserved for future use,13=Reserved for future use,14=AIS-SART is active,15=Not defined (default)'. Navigation Status. AIVDM/AIVDO data format.

airDraught.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Air Draught (distance from the top of a vessel''s highest point to its waterline). Units: 'meters'

draught.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Draught (vertical distance between the waterline and the bottom of the hull (keel)). Units: 'meters'

dataProvider.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

destinationPort.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Destination Port (Geographic coding scheme UN/LOCODE (Unitsed Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations))

previousPort.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Previous Port (Geographic coding scheme UN/LOCODE (Unitsed Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations))
